name: The Wizard Ran: Vinto's Interlude
description:
Small update i just realized i accidentally called the respawner a pentagon oh my god why do i never proofread my stuff please guys ignore that small mistake


PLAY THE OFFICIAL THE WIZARD RAN SERIES HERE

A special episode of the wizard's adventures, made for The Wizard Jammed Game Jam.

Sadly, i could not make this a browser game, as i don't own an HTML5 license for gamemaker, so i have no way of debugging and exporting it. I hope you're fine with an executable instead.

(THIS GAME IS NON-CANON TO THE WIZARD RAN UNIVERSE, AS IT WAS NOT MADE BY ADRIEN DITTRICK.) 

This episode takes place shortly after the events of The Wizard Ran 4, as it looks like one of the guests has set their eyes on the wizard...
When the wizard ran away in Chapter 6, then tried to respawn, he did not end up where he thought he would, but also not where a certain someone was expecting him, instead, he finds himself in another universe, and it looks like he's not alone...
Will the wizard fight his way out?

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow keys: move
  • Spacebar/X/Left Mouse: interact
  • Use the mouse for some actions
  • You need the knowledge of reaching the bouncing apostle in this game

Your time will NOT show up at any of the endings if you use cheats, secret dev room included.
